translation:
Most Illustrious Sir Juan Antonio de Silvera  
Cerro Largo, May 9, 1839

Respectable Sir,

With the greatest pleasure I have received the esteemed letter of Your Lordship.

Without further matter, I remain at Your Lordship's service.

Manuel de Aleman
